metadata.vision: A fully immersive, text-based MUD featuring a rich color system, autonomous NPC agents, and the first major content expansion 'Shadowfen'.
goals: Stable Foundation: Zero deployment errors, robust testing pipeline.
Immersive UX: Full color system, auto-scrolling, polished UI.
Rich Content: Retrofitted world + new Shadowfen region.
Agent Autonomy: Agents actively developing and monitoring the game.
